title: BRIEF-CFIA Says Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Brand Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157:H7
text:
BRIEF-CFIA Says Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Brand Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157:H7

Economy 3 hours ago (Oct 05, 2019 04:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-CFIA Says Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Brand Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157:H7 Oct 5 (Reuters) - Canadian Food Inspection Agency: * RYDING-REGENCY MEAT PACKERS LTD. BRAND RAW BEEF AND RAW VEAL PRODUCTS RECALLED DUE TO E. COLI O157:H7 * RYDING-REGENCY MEAT PACKERS RECALLING RYDING-REGENCY MEAT PACKERS BRAND RAW BEEF, RAW VEAL PRODUCTS DUE TO POSSIBLE E. COLI O157:H7 CONTAMINATION * THERE HAVE BEEN NO REPORTED ILLNESSES ASSOCIATED WITH CONSUMPTION OF RECALLED PRODUCTS FROM RYDING-REGENCY MEAT PACKERS

BRIEF-CFIA Says Ryding-Regency Meat Packers Brand Raw Beef And Raw Veal Products Recalled Due To E. Coli O157:H7
